Python Libraries

Data

Corgis per country over time

This dataset is from the Cardigan Archives and scraped using Beautiful Soup in Python and further processed in Python into this form.

Subset of full Corgi database

This dataset is from the Cardigan Archives and scraped using Beautiful Soup in Python and further processed in Python into this form.

Galaxy Particle Simulation files (77Mb)

Downsampled output files from a particle simulation of a galaxy merger

Isolated Galaxy dataset (292 Mb)

A single snapshot in time of a grid simulation of an isolated galaxy
